task.title: How to add numbers
task.shortdesc: This section demonstrates how to use the addition feature of The Smart Calculator app.

prereq.p: To successfully add numbers, you must know what addition is.

result.p: The result of addition is displayed.

example.p: If you want to add 6 and 4, the equation will look like: 6+4=10. You enter 6, select plus, enter 4, and then select equal. The result 10 appears on the screen.
